movie_title: United against food waste - 6 Minute English
introduction: According to the UN, one third of the food we grow ends up in the rubbish bin. In this programme, we

vocabulary.definition: given an order or command to do something
vocabulary.example: The artist was commissioned to paint a mural for the new museum.

vocabulary.definition: a sequence of events that is imagined or projected to happen
vocabulary.example: In a worst-case scenario, the company might have to declare bankruptcy.

vocabulary.definition: a short and striking or memorable phrase used in advertising
vocabulary.example: Their company's slogan is 'Quality you can trust'.

vocabulary.definition: to say or estimate that a specified thing will happen in the future
vocabulary.example: It's difficult to predict the outcome of the upcoming election.

vocabulary.definition: careful to avoid potential problems or dangers
vocabulary.example: She took a cautious approach when investing in the stock market.

vocabulary.definition: a large painting or artwork applied directly to a wall or ceiling
vocabulary.example: The city commissioned a mural to brighten up the downtown area.
